Words to Kick Your Teeth Out

Orc

Give me a wish ⁠— and I will wish you well I will give you ⁠— a magic spell I'm in a mood, rather wicked I seek death ⁠— or something like it Give me your spite And I will write Vicious murder, black shit ⁠— of Brigid's womb I will bring a man ⁠— to his tomb Dead things know ⁠— buried passions, wrath and thirst I am the font ⁠— Pluto's curse Liquid of the Mnemosyne Drink and dream And all ugly things in your sight Bitter words I will write

Previous: The Best CoffeeNext: Hunter Hunter
Author
@Molossus Spondee
Posted
Nov 1, 2022
Category
poem
